text: cherez yikhnyu skupistʹ do vas! Koly yikh okhoplyuye strakh, ty bachysh, yak vony dyvlyatʹsya na tebe: yikhni ochi bihayutʹ, nache v toho, khto mliye pered smertyu! A koly strakh mynaye, vony obrazhayutʹ vas svoyimy hostrymy yazykamy, skuplyatʹsya na dobro. Vony ne uviruvaly, Allah zrobytʹ marnymy yikhni vchynky! I tse dlya Allaha lehko
